TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNamespaceManager extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver
Public Class XmlNamespaceManager Implements IEnumerable, IXmlNamespaceResolver
public ref class XmlNamespaceManager : System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver

summary.span: 解析、加入並移除集合的命名空間，並且為這些命名空間提供範圍管理。

span.span: Resolves, adds, and removes namespaces to a collection and provides scope management for these namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何宣告和使用 XML 文件中命名空間的一般資訊，請參閱[管理 XML 文件中的命名空間](~/docs/standard/data/xml/managing-namespaces-in-an-xml-document.md)。For general information about how namespaces are declared and used in XML documents, see [Managing Namespaces in an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/managing-namespaces-in-an-xml-document.md). 儲存為字串的前置詞和命名空間。 stores prefixes and namespaces as strings. 以下是您可以使用這個類別執行的管理和查詢工作的摘要。Here's a summary of management and lookup tasks you can perform with this class. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請追蹤每個方法或屬性的參考頁面連結。For more information and examples, follow the links to the reference page for each method or property. |以To|使用Use| |--------|---------| |加入命名空間Add a namespace| 方法 method| |移除命名空間Remove a namespace| 方法 method| |尋找預設命名空間的 URIFind the URI for the default namespace| 屬性 property| |尋找命名空間前置詞的 URIFind the URI for a namespace prefix| 方法 method| |尋找命名空間 URI 的前置詞Find the prefix for a namespace URI| 方法 method| |取得目前節點中的命名空間清單Get a list of namespaces in the current node| 方法 method| |設定命名空間的範圍Scope a namespace| 和 方法 and methods| |檢查前置詞是否定義於目前範圍中Check whether a prefix is defined in the current scope| 方法 method| |取得用來查詢前置詞與 URI 的名稱資料表Get the name table used to look up prefixes and URIs| 屬性 property| 若要將命名空間加入至命名空間管理員，您建立物件，然後使用方法。To add namespaces to the namespace manager, you create a object and then use the method. 預設的前置詞和命名空間配對會在建立時自動加入命名空間管理員內。Default prefix and namespace pairs are automatically added to the namespace manager on creation. 當您建立命名空間管理員時，您可以指定的名稱表，從， ，或類別，並接著使用加入命名空間的方法。When you create the namespace manager, you can specify a name table from the , , or class, and then use the method to add the namespaces. 您可以提供物件做為參數來或方法類別來執行參考命名空間限定項目和屬性名稱的 XPath 查詢運算式。You can supply the object as a parameter to the or method of the class to execute XPath query expressions that reference namespace-qualified element and attribute names. 命名空間管理員會假設前置詞和命名空間已經過驗證，並且符合[W3C 命名空間](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)規格。The namespace manager assumes that prefixes and namespaces have already been verified and conform to the [W3C Namespaces](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) specification. 命名空間管理員不會執行任何驗證。The namespace manager does not perform any validation. 命名空間管理員在加入時加以使用 atomizes 字串方法以及查詢執行時使用或方法。The namespace manager atomizes the strings when they are added by using the method and when a lookup is performed by using the or method. 命名空間管理員除了會加入和擷取命名空間之外，還會實作列舉型別支援。The namespace manager implements enumeration support in addition to adding and retrieving namespaces. 您可以透過將資訊儲存在命名空間管理員，使用迴圈`foreach`建構。You can loop through the information saved in the namespace manager by using the `foreach` construct. 例如，如果您具有名稱建立命名空間管理員`nsmanager`，您可以逐一查看資料表使用`foreach (String prefix in nsmanager)`。For example, if you create a namespace manager with the name `nsmanager`, you can iterate through the table by using `foreach (String prefix in nsmanager)`. 因為命名空間管理員會提供一個將前置詞和命名空間當做物件的字串比較功能，所以使用命名空間管理員的效能會比直接比較字串來得高。Because the namespace manager provides a string comparison with the prefix and namespaces as objects, there is a performance improvement when using the namespace manager over the direct comparison of a string. 下列程式碼範例示範如何將繫結的前置詞`xsd`的命名空間 URI 的`http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema`並將它加入至命名空間管理員：The following code example shows how to bind the prefix `xsd` with the namespace URI of `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` and add it to the namespace manager: ```vb nsmgr.AddNamespace("xsd", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema") ``` ```csharp nsmgr.AddNamespace("xsd", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"); ``` 您可以使用，以再尋找命名空間方法：You can then find the namespace by using the method: ```vb nsmgr.LookupNamespace("xsd") ``` ```csharp nsmgr.LookupNamespace("xsd"); ``` 下列範例會建立使用從 XML 讀取器的名稱資料表：The following example creates an by using the name table from an XML reader: ```vb Dim reader As New XmlTextReader("myfile.xml") Dim nsmanager As New XmlNamespaceManager(reader.NameTable) nsmanager.AddNamespace("msbooks", "www.microsoft.com/books") nsmanager.PushScope() nsmanager.AddNamespace("msstore", "www.microsoft.com/store") While reader.Read() Console.WriteLine("Reader Prefix:{0}", reader.Prefix) Console.WriteLine("XmlNamespaceManager Prefix:{0}", nsmanager.LookupPrefix(nsmanager.NameTable.Get(reader.NamespaceURI))) End While ``` ```csharp XmlTextReader reader = new XmlTextReader("myfile.xml"); XmlNamespaceManager nsmanager = new XmlNamespaceManager(reader.NameTable); nsmanager.AddNamespace("msbooks", "www.microsoft.com/books"); nsmanager.PushScope(); nsmanager.AddNamespace("msstore", "www.microsoft.com/store"); while (reader.Read()) { Console.WriteLine("Reader Prefix:{0}", reader.Prefix); Console.WriteLine("XmlNamespaceManager Prefix:{0}", nsmanager.LookupPrefix(nsmanager.NameTable.Get(reader.NamespaceURI))); } ```

span.span: The to use.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱表格用來查詢前置詞和命名空間。The name table is used to look up prefixes and namespaces. 建構函式中，可以指定現有名稱資料表預先不可部分完成的字串。An existing name table with pre-atomized strings can be specified in the constructor. 在此情況下，有幾個好處。There are several advantages in doing so. 例如，如果名稱表格的物件，則每個讀取任何命名空間和前置詞字串推入的名稱資料表之後可以重複使用由。For example, if the name table of an object is used, after each read, any namespace and prefix strings pushed into the name table can be re-used by . 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information on atomized strings, see . > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定現有的名稱表，在名稱表格中的任何命名空間不會自動新增至。If you specify an existing name table, any namespaces in the name table are not automatically added to . 您必須使用和新增或移除命名空間。You must use and to add or remove namespaces. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用讀取器的名稱表格。The following example creates an using the name table of the reader. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is passed to the constructor

Public Overridable Sub AddNamespace (prefix As String, uri As String)
public: virtual void AddNamespace(System::String ^ prefix, System::String ^ uri);

param.name: prefix
param.span: 與要加入的命名空間關聯的前置詞。

span.span: The prefix to associate with the namespace being added.

param.span: 使用 String.Empty 來加入預設命名空間。

span.span: Use String.Empty to add a default namespace.

param.span: **附註**：如果 將用於解析 XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 運算式中的命名空間，則必須指定前置詞。

span.span: **Note**If the will be used for resolving namespaces in an XML Path Language (XPath) expression, a prefix must be specified.

param.span: 如果 XPath 運算式不包括前置詞，則會假設命名空間統一資源識別項 (URI) 為空命名空間。

span.span: If an XPath expression does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace.

param.span: 如需有關 XPath 運算式以及 的詳細資訊，請參考 和 方法。

span.span: For more information about XPath expressions and the , refer to the and methods.
The namespace to add.

summary.span: 將指定的命名空間加入集合中。

span.span: Adds the given namespace to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會檢查`prefix`和`uri`的一致性。 does not check `prefix` and `uri` for conformance. 檢查名稱，包括前置詞和命名空間，以確保其為有效的 XML 名稱，根據全球資訊網協會 (W3C)[命名空間規格](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)。 checks names, including prefixes and namespaces, to ensure they are valid XML names according to the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Namespaces specification](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/). 會在內部使用，因此為了避免重複的工作，假設所有前置詞和命名空間是否有效。 is used internally by , so to avoid a duplication of efforts, assumes all prefixes and namespaces are valid. 如果前置詞和命名空間已存在於目前的範圍內，新的前置詞及命名空間配對會取代現有的命名空間前置詞/組合。If the prefix and namespace already exist within the current scope, the new prefix and namespace pair will replace the existing prefix/namespace combination. 相同的前置詞和命名空間的組合可以跨越不同的領域。The same prefix and namespace combination can exist across different scopes. 依預設加入下列命名空間前置詞/組。The following prefix/namespace pairs are added by default to the . 您可以判斷它們在任何範圍。They can be determined at any scope. |前置詞Prefix|命名空間Namespace| |------------|---------------| |xmlnsxmlns|http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/ （xmlns 前置詞的命名空間）http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/ (the xmlns prefix namespace)| |xmlxml|http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace （XML 命名空間）http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace (the XML namespace)| |String.EmptyString.Empty|String.Empty （空的命名空間）。String.Empty (the empty namespace). 這個值可以是指派不同的前置詞。This value can be reassigned a different prefix. 例如，xmlns =""定義的預設命名空間是空的命名空間For example, xmlns="" defines the default namespace to be the empty namespace| ## Examples 下列範例會使用來解析命名空間中的 XML 片段。The following example uses to resolve namespaces in an XML fragment. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The value for is "xml" or "xmlns".
The value for or is .

summary.span: 取得預設命名空間的命名空間 URI。

span.span: Gets the namespace URI for the default namespace.

value.span: 傳回預設命名空間的命名空間 URI，若無預設命名空間，則傳回 String.Empty。

span.span: Returns the namespace URI for the default namespace, or String.Empty if there is no default namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於呼叫 LookupNamespace(String.Empty)。This method is equivalent to calling LookupNamespace(String.Empty). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示預設的命名空間，如果有的話。The following example displays the default namespace, if one exists. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回用於逐一查看 中命名空間的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator to use to iterate through the namespaces in the .
An containing the prefixes stored by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列程式碼示範如何使用若要檢視所有的命名空間組儲存在物件。The following code shows how to use the to view all the namespace pairs stored in the object. ``` Dim nsEnum As IEnumerator = nsmgr.GetEnumerator() Do While nsEnum.MoveNext If nsEnum.Current <> "" Then MsgBox("xmlns:" + nsEnum.Current + "=" + nsmgr.LookupNamespace(nsEnum.Current)) End If Loop ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> GetNamespacesInScope (System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope scope);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> GetNamespacesInScope(valuetype System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope scope) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetNamespacesInScope (scope As XmlNamespaceScope) As IDictionary(Of String, String)
public: virtual System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ GetNamespacesInScope(System::Xml::XmlNamespaceScope scope);

param.name: scope
param.span: 列舉值，指定要傳回之命名空間節點的類型。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the type of namespace nodes to return.

summary.span: 取得命名空間名稱集合，會根據前置詞索引，可用於列舉目前在範圍中的命名空間。

span.span: Gets a collection of namespace names keyed by prefix which can be used to enumerate the namespaces currently in scope.

returns.span: 目前在範圍中的命名空間和前置詞配對集合。

span.span: A collection of namespace and prefix pairs currently in scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典包含做為索引鍵的前置詞的命名空間名稱的集合。The dictionary consists of a collection of namespace names keyed by prefix. 它可以用來列舉的範圍內的命名空間。It can be used to enumerate the in-scope namespaces. 字典是命名空間清單的複本已中斷連線。The dictionary is a disconnected copy of the namespace list. 它會保持不變目前的範圍內的命名空間清單變更。It remains unchanged as the current in-scope namespace list changes. 下表顯示如何值會影響所傳回的命名空間方法。The following table shows how values affect the namespaces returned by the method. |XmlNamespaceScope valueXmlNamespaceScope value|xmlns:xmlxmlns:xml|xmlns:xmlnsxmlns:xmlns|xmlns=""xmlns=""| |-----------------------------|---------------|-----------------|---------------| |`All`|[是]Yes|否No|否No| |`ExcludeXml`|否No|否No|否No| |`Local`|否No|否No|[是]Yes|

param.name: prefix

span.span: The prefix of the namespace you want to find.

summary.span: 取得值，表示提供的前置詞是否具有針對目前推送的範圍中定義的命名空間。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the supplied prefix has a namespace defined for the current pushed scope.

returns.span: 如果已經定義命名空間，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if there is a namespace defined; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否有空白的命名空間定義的預設值，設定`prefix`至 String.Empty。To determine whether there is a default empty namespace defined, set `prefix` to String.Empty. 傳回值為`true`表示目前的範圍; 中定義的預設命名空間`false`指出已定義預設的命名空間。A return value of `true` indicates that there is a default namespace defined in the current scope; `false` indicates that no default namespace is defined. > [!NOTE] > xmlns =""是根據不合法的[W3C 命名空間](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)建議。xmlns:x= "" is illegal according to the [W3C Namespaces](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendation. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示預設的命名空間，如果有的話。The following example displays the default namespace, if one exists. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 您要解析其命名空間 URI 的前置詞。

span.span: The prefix whose namespace URI you want to resolve.

span.span: To match the default namespace, pass String.Empty.

summary.span: 取得指定前置詞的命名空間 URI。

returns.span: 若無對應的命名空間，則傳回 或 的命名空間 URI。

The returned string is atomized.

returns.span: 如需原子化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會將前置詞/命名空間組，然後顯示集合中的所有組。The following example adds prefix/namespace pairs to the , and then displays all the pairs in the collection. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.PopScope Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.PopScope Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.PopScope Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.PopScope Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.PopScope Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.PopScope Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string LookupPrefix (string uri);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string LookupPrefix(string uri) cil managed
Public Overridable Function LookupPrefix (uri As String) As String
public: virtual System::String ^ LookupPrefix(System::String ^ uri);

param.name: uri
param.span: 用來解析前置詞的命名空間。

span.span: The namespace to resolve for the prefix.

summary.span: 尋找為指定命名空間 URI 宣告的前置詞。

span.span: Finds the prefix declared for the given namespace URI.
The matching prefix.

returns.span: 如果沒有對應的前置詞，此方法會傳回 String.Empty。

span.span: If there is no mapped prefix, the method returns String.Empty.

returns.span: 如果提供了 null 值，則會傳回 。

span.span: If a null value is supplied, then is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會藉由查核堆疊來尋找對應的前置詞 （也就是它看起來全域）。This method finds the mapped prefix by walking the stack (that is, it looks globally). 提供的字串必須不可部分完成的成功查閱。The supplied string must be atomized for the lookup to succeed. 換句話說，提供之字串物件必須存在於命名空間管理員的名稱表格 ()。In other words, the supplied string object must exist in the namespace manager's name table (). 傳回的字串也不可部分完成。The returned string is also atomized. 如需原子化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information on atomized strings, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用時寫入屬性的方法。The following example shows how to use the method when writing an attribute. 它會使用方法啟動屬性，查閱的前置詞`urn:samples`命名空間 URI，然後使用該前置詞撰寫時`ISBN`屬性：It uses the method to start the attribute, looks up the prefix for the `urn:samples` namespace URI, and then uses that prefix in the when writing the `ISBN` attribute: ```vb Dim prefix As String = nsMgr.LookupPrefix("urn:samples") writer.WriteStartAttribute(prefix, "ISBN", "urn:samples") ``` ```csharp XmlNameTable nt = new XmlNameTable(); XmlNamespaceManager nsMgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nt); nsMgr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples");string prefix = writer nsMgr.LookupPrefix("urn:samples"); writer.WriteStartAttribute(prefix, "ISBN", "urn:samples"); ``` 下列範例會使用若要尋找的項目上定義的前置詞。The following example uses to find the prefix defined on an element. ```vb writer.WriteStartElement("root", "book") writer.WriteStartElement("x", "node", "author") s = writer.LookupPrefix("author") CError.Compare(s, "x", "Error in nested element") writer.WriteEndElement() s = writer.LookupPrefix("book") CError.Compare(s, Nothing, "Error in root element") writer.WriteEndElement() ``` **輸出****Output** ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool PopScope ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool PopScope() cil managed
Public Overridable Function PopScope () As Boolean
public: virtual bool PopScope();

summary.span: 將命名空間範圍自堆疊取出。

span.span: Pops a namespace scope off the stack.

returns.span: 如果堆疊上留有命名空間範圍，則為 ，若未取出其他命名空間，則為 。

span.span: if there are namespace scopes left on the stack; if there are no more namespaces to pop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫這個方法，它所加入的所有命名空間(藉由呼叫) 自上次呼叫會移除。When you call this method, all namespaces which were added to (by calling ) since the last call to are removed. ## Examples 下列範例會將前置詞/命名空間組，然後顯示集合中的所有組。The following example adds prefix/namespace pairs to the and then displays all the pairs in the collection. summary.span: 將命名空間範圍推送至堆疊。

span.span: Pushes a namespace scope onto the stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，加入至的所有命名空間之後(藉由呼叫)，屬於推入的命名空間範圍。After a call to this method, all namespaces, which are added to (by calling ), belong to the pushed namespace scope. ## Examples 下列範例會將前置詞/命名空間組，然後顯示集合中的所有組。The following example adds prefix/namespace pairs to the and then displays all the pairs in the collection.
